resources.string:
By creating your %1$s account, you agree
to our %2$s
A menu for the public cells activity.
An email has been sent with reset instructions, please check your email
Please enter your email address and tap on Submit
Hi, feel free to scan my qr code and join me on Cell 411 network to get help in emergency
Are you sure you want to logout? You will no longer be able to receive and send emergency alerts!
Drug allergy, skin allergy, rhinitis, etc.
Turning this feature on will allow you to receive Cell 411 alert whenever a new public cell is created nearby you. This feature requires Location Updates to be turned on.
Turning this feature on will allow you to receive Cell 411 alerts when someone in the patrol radius needs help. This feature requires Location Updates to be turned on.
Please select if you would like Cell 411 to use kilometers or miles as the standard distance unit.
Turning this feature on will enable the fake delete button on video alerts in Alerts tab.
Turning this feature on will increase your GPS accuracy but it may decrease your battery life.
Turning this feature on will update your location constantly so that you always see your updated location but it may decrease your battery life.
Cameras are your best defense against the police. If they know they are being recorded, they will be less tempted to violate your rights!
ASK "AM I BEING DETAINED?" IF YOU ARE NOT, LEAVE
If you are not being detained, just walk away. Officers must be able to articulate their "reasonable suspicion" that a crime has been or is about to be committed in order to detain you.
You are never required to talk to police. Speaking to an officer can only be used to hurt you. Only reveal your identity if you\'re driving.

If they are asking to search you, your things, your car, or home, it\'s because they need your consent. They won\'t ask to search if they have a warrant or "probable cause". If an officer searches you without your permission, do not resist the search but always say you do not consent.
These are supposedly your servants. If you feel intimidated by the police, they are not doing their job correctly. Always be polite, as police can often act irrationally if offended.

Public cells can be officially verified by Cell 411 to confirm the identity of the owner and the legitimacy of the cell. In order to be verified, please use a specific name for your cell. For example, a cell named “New York City” is misleading as it is not owned by the City of New York, however a cell named “New York City 55th St. Crime Watch” is more specific and likely to be verified.
is already registered, please use different.

Public cells that you own or joined will appear here
Are you sure you want to delete %s public cell?
Turning location updates off will also disable %s. Do you still want to turn it off?
Turning location updates off will also disable %1$s and %2$s. Do you still want to turn it off?

When this feature is enabled, a picture will be taken of anyone attempting to delete a Cell 411 video alert using your phone\'s front camera. The video will not be deleted and will appear again when the app is relaunched.
You have not flagged any user as a spammer.
Stream and share live video with?
Would you like to capture a new image, or add one from the Gallery?
You are in a Patrol Mode and received a Global Alert.
You must have at least two friends and must have issued an alert to some private cell in order to issue alerts globally
Your new friend %s is not part of any Cell. Would you like to add this friend to a Cell?
%1$s wants to add you as a friend in the %2$s network. If approved, this user will be able to send you emergency alerts.
A new public cell called %s has just been created in your area. Tap on Join Cell to join this public cell, or Cancel to ignore.
%s is streaming live video. Would you like to watch it? You can also watch this video later from Alerts tab in your Settings
No application can handle this request. Please install a video player that supports RTSP
%1$s a member of %2$s issued a photo alert. Would you like to view it? You can also view it later from Alerts tab in your Settings
%s issued a photo alert. Would you like to view it? You can also view it later from Alerts tab in your Settings
This public cell has not been officially verified yet
Cells are groups of friends that you can configure to customize alerting

string-array.name: gallery_titles
string-array.item: Are you lost with a broken car?

string-array.name: gallery_desc
string-array.item: \"This is the app that allows you to issue and respond to emergencies from your family, friends and neighbors in real time\"
\"Let your friends and neighbors know of lurking dangers in your community and improve safety in your neighborhood\"
\"Cell 411 will send your exact coordinates to trusted people so they can find you and help you when you need help most\"
\"You can stream live video and audio to all your friends and groups, to one person or one thousand. The video cannot be deleted or erased.\"

resources.string: Hi, I am using Cell 411 to issue emergency alerts. It\'s free.\nWhy don\'t you check it out on your Phone.\n%s
You need some friends or incidents to chat about. Join a public cell in your area or respond to an alert if you want to chat.
This user has no profile picture available
Mobile number already registered, please try another
Search by Name, Phone or Email
Tap on the friend icon below to add your friends into this private cell
Are you sure you want to remove %s from this Cell?
Image (Download the latest version via %s to view this image)
Are you sure you want to share your current location?
Can\'t share location, this chat is expired
Can\'t share image, this chat is expired
Are you sure you want to delete this chat?
Choose your audience to send alert
With device location turned off, %1$s %2$s has also become disabled. Once you enable location services, the feature will automatically come online.
With device location turned off, %1$s %2$s and %3$s have also become disabled. Once you enable location services, these features will automatically come online.
Please confirm that you agree to our terms and check each of the points below, hereby acknowledging that you took them into consideration and agree with all of them.
We will not sell or disclose your data to any third private party
You can delete your account at any time
You agree to have your data processed by us
You have read and hereby agree to our updated privacy policy
*Please check off all points listed above

• Location - for sending alerts with your location, receiving location-specific alerts,

• Camera - for sending image & video alerts, recording & streaming interaction.*

• Phone - for dialing emergency service numbers via the default dialing app.*

• Contacts - for inviting and adding your existing contacts to join Cells.*

• Storage - for locally storing video/photo recordings, loading images from the device into the app.*
* Requires specific user action from within the app, no automatic initiation.
No browsers installed, please go to Play Store to rate it
Are you sure you want to delete your Cell 411 account? This action is irreversible.
Your archived data was already sent to your e-mail address, recently. You can ask again for a new download of all your data in %d days.
A link to your data archive will be soon sent to your e-mail address. (Please also look in your SPAM folder)
Turning this feature on will enable dark mode for Map
